elements.hover_text: Change the way you control TETR.PY.

buttons.hover_text: The standard controls, as seen in many stacker games.
A WASD based layout, that sets piece movement to the left hand and rotation to the right.
Custom controls - set them as you wish.

elements.hover_text: Change the keybinding scheme.
Try out these settings.
Reset these settings to their default values.
Change how TETR.PY feels.
When a piece locks on its own, the hard drop action is disabled for a few frames to prevent accidental hard drops.
When changing directions the DAS charge is reset.
At very high speeds, the soft drop action will be performed before horziontal movement.
The most recent direction input will be prioritised when multiple directions are pressed.
Tweak the music randomiser to your liking.
Change the way TETR.PY sounds.
Whether to allow scrolling ingame (or holding ALT and scrolling anywhere) to change the volume.
If enabled, the background music will be muted when TETR.PY is minimised or tabbed away.
Wether to play a sound effect that signifies the next piece to spawn in.
Wether to hear the sound effects of of other players in multiplayer games.
Wether to hear the sound effects of sent and received attacks in multiplayer games.

elements.text: do not reset music when retrying
elements.hover_text: If enabled, the background music won't be reset when retrying a game.
If enabled, no audio will ever play. This will speed up the game, with a rather obvious drawback.
Change the way TETR.PY functions.

elements.title: ACTION TEXT

buttons.hover_text: Don't display any action text when doing special attacks.
Display only non-distracting action text when doing special attacks.
Display all action text when doing special attacks.

elements.hover_text: Change the amount of action text that is displayed when doing special attacks.
Wether to display a duel side-by-side, this causes your board to be shifted to the left slightly.

elements.text: spin the board when you spin a piece
elements.hover_text: When enabled, the board reactions to spins by rotating a little bit with it.

elements.text: alert me when i KO someone
elements.hover_text: If enabled, show a popup when you KO someone or you get KO'd.

elements.text: warn me when i'm in danger
elements.hover_text: If enabled, the board will turn red and a warning sound will play when you're in danger.
If enabled, the shadow piece will be coloured to match the piece it represents.
If enabled, the held piece will be greyed out when it's locked.
Change the way TETR.PY looks.

elements.title: GRAPHICS

buttons.hover_text: Disable everything (including textures) for the highest performance but worst visuals.
No particles, effects, or animations. Use this for better performance, or if you simply dislike the flare.
Less particles and effects. Remove any non-gameplay related particles and effects
All the particles and effects.

elements.hover_text: The grahical quality preset to be used.

elements.title: TARGET FPS

buttons.hover_text: Limit the frame rate to 30 frames per second.
Limit the frame rate to 60 frames per second.
Limit the frame rate to 144 frames per second.
Don't limit the frame rate.

elements.hover_text: The target frame rate the game will try to achieve.

elements.title: RENDER SCALING

buttons.hover_text: Turn off render scaling, and render the game at the current resolution of the window.
Apply render scaling, but adjust the internal resolution of the game when the game is fullscreened.
Apply render scaling, but restrict the internal resolution of the game to a set value.

elements.hover_text: EXPERIMENTAL: This can increase performance even when the render scale is set to 100%. Visual artifacts and other bugs may occur.

elements.title: render scale
elements.hover_text: The factor of the windows resolution that the game is rendered at. Lower values will increase performance, but increase pixelation.

elements.title: GUI scale
elements.hover_text: The size of the GUI elements, 100% is the default size.
Wether to enable fullscreen mode.
If enabled, the boards of other players will always be simplified. This will increase performance, but looks less nice.
If enabled, the background will not be rendered when in menus. This will majorly increase performance, however you will no longer see the backgrounds.
If enabled, the replay tools do not collapse when you're not using them.

elements.text: warn me when the game is not focused
elements.hover_text: If enabled, a warning is displayed when TETR.PY is not in focus.
Add your own personal spin to TETR.PY.
Wether to use provided custom backgrond image(s).

elements.title: BLOCK SKIN

buttons.hover_text: Use the default textures for the tetromino blocks.
Draw the tetromino blocks as a singular solid colour, this is more performant as no textures are used.
Use a provided custom texture for the tetromino blocks.

elements.hover_text: Change the way the tetromino blocks look.
